summary:
Add Healer Onean and Warrior Altair in your Skyrim.
Pandea_Work it's me.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://ww1.sinaimg.cn/large/74311666jw1ezl4e9c3igj21hc0mvadq.jpg[/img]
====================
[What is Onean and Version 1.70 Series]

-Standalone Healer Follower
Onean is a healer for playerteammate.She will use Therapeutic Aura and Great Recovery to healing player.

-Customized Voice
Voice Actor TamakoDan

-Customized Meshes
Onean's Body had customized from Bodyslide(Base UNPB).Player can use Bodyslide Present(OneanBody) to generate onean's fitted clothes and armor.

-Customized Skeleton
Base XPMSE.This skelestion have revise for 0.92 hight.She look like just a cute small girl.

-Customized Textures
Fair skin fix SG Skin.And...i have fix something with my pen.

-Life AI
She live in Whiterun.

-Transfiguration System
When Onean is in danger.If she had wear Oneana's Amulet,Oneana will replaced Onean to fight.

-Customized Outfit
She has her own clothes.Player can change this by dialogue.

-Cure Disease
She can cure the Wolfsoul and Vampire.Be careful!

-Recovery Trainer
Master Rank!

-Onean's fluid
This is a good thing.U know.
====================
[Updata LOG]
1.744
[Skyrim healer Onean Cosmetic Patch]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82533?

1.74
-Fixed the Textures Errors.
Sorry for Onean and Altair.

1.73
-Fix the Following Bug.
Onean don't miss anymore.
-Add a lot of Outfit.
It's ok.
-Add some voice.
Include when you are naked.
-Add some Magic.
I choose you!Onean!
-I hate the Temple...
If you want to find her,just go to the street.Or find her in the warrrior's home when the sun have down.
-Remenber!Uninstall the Old Version!
First!.

1.72 Plus
-Stabilization!
Remove Onean's shapeshift skill.(So you must remove the OLD VERSION!)
-Safe Healing
Simplified script.
-More dialogue.
Degree of appreciation
-More Outfit.
Degree of appreciation
-Relationship Rank.
Onean have own relationship system.How to close to her?Just have fun~
-Self introduction.
If you first use Onean.Go to the Temple of Whiterun to find her!
-NEW Body
Yes...With vagina and the New textures...

1.71
-You can talk with her when you meet her at whiterun first.No longer use save and load.
====================
